alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 12:08AM PST until February 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM PST THIS MORNING UNTIL 10 PM PST TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Sustained west winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts around 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Indian Wells Valley, Mojave Desert Slopes, and Mojave Desert in Southeastern Kern County. * WHEN...From 10 AM PST this morning until 10 PM PST Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may reduce visibilities in some locations. Strong wind gusts could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 58, Highway 178, U.S. Highway 395, and Highway 14.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
